name: 2025 The 8th International Conference on Materials Engineering and Applications
content: Publication: Accepted papers will be published in below listed journals of Scientific.Net collection. Papers will be sent for indexing by Scopus, Inspec, Chemical Abstracts Service, Google Scholar etc. >>Materials Science Forum (MSF) ISSN print 0255-5476 ISSN web 1662-9752 >>Key Engineering Materials (KEM) ISSN print 1013-9826 ISSN web 1662-9795 >>Solid State Phenomena (SSP) ISSN print 1012-0394 ISSN web 1662-9779 >>Defect and Diffusion Forum (DDF) ISSN print 1012-0386 ISSN web 1662-9507
